Description: I made several updates to [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend] today. I displayed the purchase points option and loading indicator on all platforms in the credits view. I also integrated RevenueCat for Android credit purchases and refactored the payment flow to use RevenueCat for Android and Stripe for other platforms.

Today, I worked on [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend] and [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api]. I refactored the code to unify Stripe payment processing for both Android and iOS by removing platform-specific payment conditions in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend]. I also added multi-gateway payment selection and dynamically displayed points based on the chosen gateway in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend]. Furthermore, I implemented dynamic payment configurations for credit packages by adding a new model, API endpoint, and integrating them into the credits view in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend]. In [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api], I added a payment config debug endpoint, updated the payment gateway column to VARCHAR, and refreshed payment seed data with expanded package options.

I implemented several key updates to [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend] and [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api] today. I started by updating the Kotlin Android plugin and externalizing base URL configuration using environment variables in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend]. I also refactored the code to replace `print` with `debugPrint`, enhance the payment flow with dialog dismissal and unsupported method alert, and improve RevenueCat error reporting. Additionally, I updated several files in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend] and [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api] using Copilot. Furthermore, I bumped the app version to 1.2.11+38 in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend] and allowed payment intent creation by package ID or points in [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api].
Merged [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api] branch 'paymetGatewayLogic' into the main branch.
Problems: Previous payment gateway logic had issues with token validation and initial purchases.
Solutions: Merged updated branch to include improved payment gateway logic.

Description: Updated [Inforwaves/employee-tracking-app-mobile] gitignore to exclude macOS metadata files.
Problems: macOS metadata files were causing unnecessary clutter in the project.
Solutions: Updated gitignore to exclude these files from version control.

Description: Migrated [Inforwaves/employee-tracking-app-mobile] to Swift Package Manager, removing CocoaPods dependency management and integrating SPM for iOS plugin dependencies. Also, updated [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend] to add RevenueCat sandbox mode detection and enhanced purchase error handling, and updated [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api] to enhance RevenueCat webhook processing with detailed logging and improved token validation.
Problems: CocoaPods dependency management was causing issues with iOS plugin dependencies.
Solutions: Swift Package Manager integration enabled native support for iOS dependencies, faster dependency resolution, and better Xcode integration.

Description: Added ignore rules for backup and unused platform directories in [Inforwaves/employee-tracking-app-mobile].
Problems: Backup and unused platform directories were causing unnecessary clutter in the project.
Solutions: Added ignore rules to exclude these directories from version control.

Description: Enhanced RevenueCat webhook processing with detailed logging, improved token validation, support for initial purchases, and environment configuration in [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api].
Problems: Previous webhook processing had issues with token validation and initial purchases.
Solutions: Updated webhook processing to include detailed logging, improved token validation, and support for initial purchases.

Description: Initialized iOS dependency management with CocoaPods and Swift Package Manager for Firebase, and updated build configurations for [Inforwaves/employee-tracking-app-mobile]. Also, added Android billing permission and implemented RevenueCat login for [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend].

Spent the day professionalizing docs, extracting UI components, and refactoring code for [Inforwaves/articom-base-mobile]. Updated package version, removed unused dependencies, and improved code formatting.
Implemented `onPressed` for `VoiceAssistantButton` and `expandOnImageTap` for `MiniCard`, updated package version, and removed unused dependencies for [Inforwaves/articom-base-mobile].

Implemented several key updates, including adding release signing configuration to the debug build type, adjusting the default API base URL, temporarily disabling the test store mode UI in credits, and renaming credit package identifiers from `credits_` to `credit_bundle_` in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend]. Additionally, I added an idempotency check to prevent duplicate transaction processing and enhanced logging in [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api].
Renamed the project in package.json and removed the 20 and 200 point payment packages from migration in [Inforwaves/xamit_rest_api].
Wrapped up the day by bumping the app version, updating the default API base URL, and setting the RevenueCat log level to error in [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend].

Fixed unassigned paper grades and null grade/medium/subject relations in [Inforwaves/viral-networks-be], allowed paper grade filter to match null grade IDs, and enhanced credits view to display package availability warnings and refine package selection logic for [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend].
Problems: Unassigned paper grades and null grade/medium/subject relations
Solutions: Fixed unassigned paper grades and null grade/medium/subject relations, allowed paper grade filter to match null grade IDs, and enhanced credits view

Description: Removed unused iOS plugins, updated RevenueCat SDK dependencies, and displayed a message when no payment methods are available for [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend].
Problems: Unused plugins and redundant SizedBox
Solutions: Removed unused plugins and updated RevenueCat SDK dependencies

Description: Implemented error message handling and credits view enhancements for [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend], refactored credits page, and updated build number. Also, added request timeouts, RevenueCat ProGuard rules, and robust error handling.
Problems: Error handling and credits view inconsistencies
Solutions: Centralized error message handling, refactored credits page, and added request timeouts and RevenueCat ProGuard rules

Description: Fixed 'Ash Screen' and 'Stuck Spinner' issues in Credits page, implemented separate Android credits page with RevenueCat, and hardened RegExp matching and list lookups for [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend].
Problems: Performance issues and inconsistent credit display.
Solutions: Improved performance and credit display for Android users.

Description: Implemented the limited credit trial flow for [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend], fixed async purchase flow, and restored credit balance display in HomeBannerWidget.
Problems: Inconsistent credit display and purchase flow.
Solutions: Improved credit trial flow and purchase functionality.

Description: Bumped the version of [Inforwaves/xamit-app-frontend] to the latest.
